column4: Hello I love to play FarmVille in Facebook and when I used Windows then it was not an issue, but now in my Ubuntu karmic it running very slow, you guys know any geeky way to make it faster?
i don't know anythinga bout farmville, but what browser are you using?
It's just another hard flash based application and I am using Chrome 5 Beta series
ah, well if it was js based, I was going to suggest using Chrome.  Much faster than FF.
